title: Organizational Learning and Gender Expression Exploration: A Phenomenological Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of organizational culture and sociology
context.additional_context: Learners participate in online sessions via smartphones and may lack prior experience with gender-related organizational learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more impacts of gender expression on knowledge sharing in organizational environments
Learners can apply a phenomenological approach to observe and document gender-related experiences within an organization.
Learners can derive at least two practical recommendations for improving organizational learning based on research findings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
